column5: Can't believe the story Roy... you're much too young to be a great grandpa... well at least J is...  (Congrats!)
Wonderful news Roy. Cherish every second of it!!
Congrats Roy!!! Now get our team a whitefish that size!!  Seriously, a special moment for sure.
Wow, great grampa eh? Crazy! Congrats Roy! I never got to meet any of my great grandparents. Luckily my kids did!  Lucky kid!!  S.
Congratulations hon, so happy for you!
Congrats! Must be fun for four generations to be around same time.
congrats!!!   enjoy every moment.   Nick
Relatively speaking ?  Congrates to All directly and indirectly involved
Great news Roy, congrat's to you and yours!
congrats Roy!
Totally awesome congrats Roy
Congratulations Roy!  What a prize for your family.
About 12 hours ago, we became great grandparents. It's quite emotional really. At 4:04 AM Aug. 4  my princess was born at 6lbs 4 ounces. Don't know what else to say....
An extra special time to be sure.
Thanks Rob.
wow, congrats Roy! Must feel good
Glad to hear momma and baby are doing well. Happy Great Grandpa n Grandma.   Art
congrats Roy
Didnt think you were that old me brudder,  Congrats to all.   What a cutie.  And no need to be sorry. WERE FAMILY HERE.
Wonderful news Roy & congrats from myself & Diane !!
Thanks guys. Yes me Brudder, You're right. We ARE family here. Thank you.
wow and congrats. another excellent chapter in life.
I'm going too go with "alright"grandparents until I talk to the actual parents.Humble much!! LOL Congrats to all involved
Congrats Roy!
Congrats as well Roy!!.Good to hear all are doing well!
Congratulations great gramps and a Leo to boot
Congratulations ! Hope you enjoy all the time you will spend with her.
Great Grampa. Thats a pretty special pic.  Congrats!
Congrats Roy! Glad I am not that old yet!
Fantastic news...congrats to all.
Congrats Roy!  My wife and I are expecting our first child (a SON!) around the start of October, so I can def appreciate your excitement!
Congrats Roy !!!! Glad to hear mom and baby are doing great !!!! I will raise one for you .... Cheers "clink"
Congrats Roy !!!! Glad to hear mom and baby are doing great !!!! I will raise one for you .... Cheers "clink"
Congratulations grampa!
That'll be great grampa to you!  Thanks everyone.
Awesome !!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Congrats my friend! Yer far too young to be a great grandfather !!! ;-)
Welcome to the World of Great Grandparenting...
